name: Schumacher "Pearl River" Linen Fabric
description:
A designer favorite from Schumacher! This colourway has been discontinued and we got our hands on what may be the last lots available anywhere. The gorgeous heavy weight linen is perfect for upholstery, pillows, drapery or other window treatments. Over a dozen colors including rust, charcoal, mustard, lavender, pale blue, teal, peach, olive and ivory. Retail price was $260/yd!

100% Linen
Width: 54"
Horizontal Repeat: 26.25"
Vertical Repeat: 26.25"
Repeat: Half Drop

Price is per yard. Orders will ship within 48 hours. All sales final.

name: Schumacher "Pearl River" Linen Fabric - Swatch
description:

Price is per yard. Orders will ship within 48 hours. All sales final.
